glosses: To prevent a harmful situation, to extinguish.
To suppress, to subdue, to take under control.
To fold the edge of a fabric and sew.
To occur suddenly and with a great force, such as rain.

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish باصدرمق (basdırmaḳ, “to let or make press, to make or let printed, to overpower, to suppress”), from Ottoman Turkish باصمق (basmaḳ), morphologically bas- + -tır + -mak
